segments.text: This kitchen scene is unfolding right in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the faucet is running and the sink is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin everything if she doesn't turn it off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that unstable stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is reaching up, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, thinking no one sees them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, all tidy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the mess yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in disaster with slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
